document.discussion_title: Is Bernie Sanders' Political Revolution In Jeopardy?
document.topic_text: Transcript: Is Bernie Sanders' Political Revolution In Jeopardy? Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders has inspired hundreds of thousands of Americans to try to build a new kind of politics. Having suffered a double-digits loss in New York last Tuesday, Sanders is now focused on garnering votes in the five states voting this week: pennsylvania, Delaware, Maryland, Rhode Island, and Connecticut. Rumors are swirling that Sanders will reassess his campaign if he does not perform well on Tuesday. Recent related news At a place famous for its raucous crowds, Bernie Sanders brought the house down with a fiery speech... bizjournals
